reviewText:
The DVD has helped me continue the 4 week course I completed at the end of June.

I recommend the LSVT Homework Helper to anyone even if they do not have Parkinson's Disease as a tool to improve their vocal communication.
Same as above.

YES,
iN EVERY WAY.  It is very well done and I like it a lot!!  IT iS A BIT PRICY HOWEVER..
LSVT IS A CUMBERSOME & BORING EXERCISE!  THE DVD MAKES IT FUN!!  SHE ISN'T AS RIGID A TEACHER AND GETS YOU ON YOUR OWN COURSE!  THANK YOU FOR MAKING ME LOVE MY HOMEWORK & MY SUCCESS IN THE CLASSROOM!
It's a DVD.  Good DVD for helping with voice volume and swallowing problems.  Great for a Parkinson's patient to assist with maintaining voice quality.
YEs, it follows the Therapist's procedures exactly, and easy to use.
Very good. Thanks.
I have Parkinson's and found this product very helpful in improving my voice quality and volume. It was very easy to use and supplemented the voice therapy I was taking.
Excellent resource for voice improvement for parkinson disease. 5 star rating

When you speak with confidence, you feel the confidence -- and people are more willing to engage in conversation.  My husband loves conversation.  This DVD helps him keep is ability to speak in a audible tone, without mumbling.  Great for any and all elders/seniors, not just those with Parkinson's.  Thank you.
the wife uses it, so I guess it must be good
I use it all the time as a continuation of my voice therapy at the University of Akron.
It doesn't work
Very useful!

I HAD HOPED  THAT LSVT HOMEWORK HELPER  WOULD PROVIDE MORE THAN IT DID, ESPECIALLY CONSIDERING ITS RELATIVELY HIGH COST.  IT WAS A REGULAR PRACTICE SESSION, WHICH IS, I HAVE TO ADMIT, MORE FUN WITH SOMEONE THAN TOTALLY ALONE, BUT I WOULD HOPE THAT MOST PEOPLE COULD FIND A LIVE "PARTNER IN CRIME" TO SHARE THE AAAAHS WITH !!!
Great way to practice LSVT loud at home, very clear directions with fun presentation.
it was not what i ordered it was an older version and i ordered the newer version
This is a good tool for our Parkinson's Support Group

This is a helpful review of voice exercises for my friend whose voice has become weakened due to Parkinson's disease.
It is a bit boring though.

Recommended to us- and is an excellent help ( My wife has Parkinson's and her speech is deteriorating- with this DVD help we will extend her abilities.
Having said that- the exercises are damned boring!!
Great way to practice!
It really helps.  My dad did the LSVT therapy and we really see the difference in his speech.  This video has been helping him continue speaking LOUD :)
Excellent product, my father, a parkinsons sufferer has already improved his speech after only two weeks of using it.

If you have a Neurological issue that affects your speech volume, this is a definite must. Don't think about it just order it. You must however practice with this 4 days a week for a minimum of 30 minutes. Your speech volume & pronunciation will improve within 6 weeks
The DVD is extremely helpful.  I am very pleased with it.
Good for PD patients
It is a great helper to go along with physical therapy. I have seen advancement ln a short time. But only use it with a professional.

Not much help is provided here. I expected more. I consider it a waste of money. However, the LSVT  BIG CDs that I bought a while back were good.

Ginger

I was extremely disappointed in this "Loud Homework" as it was supposed to be a new product. When I opened it, the stench of cigarete smoke was overpowering. It was far from new. in fact, it didn't contain anything that was supposed to be in there. All it was, was a disc, Thank God I went to speech therepy before i bought the homework. Perhaps you should check on your employees that sent it because not only am I being gyped, but you are going to lose customers. .
Way over priced but valuable if you have Parkinson's.
The video was helpful in maintaining the loud speech.
Thrilled to have this at home.
Great tutorial for the follow up with the "LOUD" therapy for Parkinsons.
i took this in pt and have found it to be very useful when practicing..
We use the DVD for a refresher to correct and add to what our therapist has worked on.  Good refresher but do not try to use this to avoid having professional help of the PT.

This is the DVD that the Speech therapist recommended for my husband.  It works well just like the speech therapy training however I am very disappointed at the price.  Sad that you can buy any other DVD for so much less.  This is a needed item for someone with Parkinson's and yet the price is so high.  Other than the price it is a good product.
This is a replacement for the CD we received after completing a "LSVT Loud" program at a physical rehab center. I would not recommend it by itself to help increase voice volume.
Fantastic exercises to improve your speech.
I have Parkinson's it's exactly what you learn in speech therapy
not worth the price
Has helped my husband with Parkkinson
An excellent product, especially as an assist in the Big & Loud program.
Use this to help a person with Parkinson's.
good

A very helpful DVD for people with Parkinson's.  After undergoing LOUD therapy with a speech pathologist, my husband tried this DVD at home,and continues to use it frequently.  It's kept his skills strong.  Very important to keep doing it to exercise the voice, gain confidence,  and help avoid losing the ability to communicate with other people.
